item.title: Exploring the Use Cases of ADMS User Migration
item.description: A Comprehensive Overview: An Insight into Active Directory Migration Services User Migration. Introduction ADMS, ADSS, and ADGMS are all cloud-based services that come within the ADxS services portfolio offered by Microsoft and designed to facilitate efficient and cost-effective migrations. For additional information around migration use cases, refer to this blog: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/blog/microsoft-security-blog/exploring-the-use-cases-of-adxs-services/4373299?previewMessage=true . ADMS or Active Directory Migration Service – is a service designed to facilitate the migration of...
